name: WindBlogTheme.Setup
description: Wind Blog Theme recipe (based on the blog theme recipe)

Roles.Name: Moderator
Roles.Description: Grants users the ability to moderate content.

Roles.Name: Editor
Roles.Description: Grants users the ability to edit existing content.

Roles.Name: Author
Roles.Description: Grants users the ability to create content.

Roles.Name: Contributor
Roles.Description: Grants users the ability to contribute content.

AutoroutePartSettings.Pattern: {{ Model.ContentItem | container | display_text | slugify }}/{{ Model.ContentItem | display_text | slugify }}

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Provides a collection behavior for your content item where you can place other content items.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: A description of the image used as title or alternate text

ContentPartSettings.Description: Allows users to enter query for fetching items.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: Enter the name of the query you want to load. You can find and define queries in "Search > Queries > All queries".

HtmlBodyPart.Html: This is the description of your blog

Data.DisplayText: Man must explore, and this is exploration at its greatest
Data.Author: [js: parameters('AdminUsername')]

TitlePart.Title: Man must explore, and this is exploration at its greatest

MarkdownBodyPart.Markdown:
Never in all their history have men been able truly to conceive of the world as one: a single sphere, a globe, having the qualities of a globe, a round earth in which all the directions eventually meet, in which there is no center because every point, or none, is center  an equal earth which all men occupy as equals. The airman's earth, if free men make it, will be truly round: a globe in practice, not in theory.

Science cuts two ways, of course; its products can be used for both good and evil. But there's no turning back from science. The early warnings about technological dangers also come from science.

What was most significant about the lunar voyage was not that man set foot on the Moon but that they set eye on the earth.

A Chinese tale tells of some men sent to harm a young girl who, upon seeing her beauty, become her protectors rather than her violators. That's how I felt seeing the Earth for the first time. I could not help but love and cherish her.

For those who have seen the Earth from space, and for the hundreds and perhaps thousands more who will, the experience most certainly changes your perspective. The things that we share in our world are far more valuable than those which divide us.

Subtitle.Text: Problems look mighty small from 150 miles up

Data.DisplayText: Man must explore, and this is exploration at its greatest 2
Data.Author: [js: parameters('AdminUsername')]

The airman's earth, if free men make it, will be truly round: a globe in practice, not in theory.

Science cuts two ways, of course; its products can be used for both good and evil. But there's no turning back from science. The early warnings about technological dangers also come from science.

What was most significant about the lunar voyage was not that man set foot on the Moon but that they set eye on the earth.

A Chinese tale tells of some men sent to harm a young girl who, upon seeing her beauty, become her protectors rather than her violators. That's how I felt seeing the Earth for the first time. I could not help but love and cherish her.

For those who have seen the Earth from space, and for the hundreds and perhaps thousands more who will, the experience most certainly changes your perspective. The things that we share in our world are far more valuable than those which divide us.

Layers.Name: Always
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are displayed on any page of this site.

Layers.Name: Homepage
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are only displayed on the homepage.

Queries.Name: RecentBlogPosts
Queries.Template: SELECT DocumentId FROM ContentItemIndex WHERE ContentType='BlogPost' ORDER BY CreatedUtc DESC LIMIT @limit:3

SqlQueryMetadata.Template: SELECT COUNT(*) AS result FROM TaxonomyIndex WHERE TaxonomyContentItemId = @taxonomyContentItemId AND  TermContentItemId = @termContentItemId AND Published = 1

SELECT DocumentId FROM TaxonomyIndex 
WHERE TermContentItemId = @categoryId 
AND TaxonomyIndex.Latest = True 
AND TaxonomyIndex.Published = True
AND ContentType = 'BlogPost'
LIMIT @limit:3
;

SELECT DocumentId FROM TaxonomyIndex 
WHERE TermContentItemId = @categoryId 
AND TaxonomyIndex.Latest = True 
AND TaxonomyIndex.Published = True
AND ContentType = 'BlogPost'
ORDER BY random()
LIMIT @limit:3
;
